item.title: My tesla coils
item.description:
Me and lighting.

Driver

Gen 1

All circuit cited from Steve UD1.3

Based 74HC74/74HC08/74HC04

The isolator is HFBT1414/HFBT2412 ST Optical Fiber

The interrupt signal transmitted through Fiber.

Gen 2

Based on CPLD Altera MAX II Integrated former door circuit into one chip. The new GDT driver used FDD8424H to instead of IRFP540/9540 MOS amplifier.

Gen 3

Based on CPLD Xilinx CoolRunner II Try to design some low power circuit and faster PWM Signal in CPLD. Add a Phase shift circuit to protect the IGBT. Add a isolated IGBT driver though Fiber instead of Gate Driver Transformer(GDT) The MAX current of LCR Serial Resonant circuit up to 3000Amps. The input power up to 20KW

Gen 4

Based on Infineon Cypress PSoc, which integrated in FPGA, PGA and ARM Developed a GUI base on Node.js A digital operate pannel with various sensor data.
